remarks: Formula building theorem for support restriction, on a function which preserves zero.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
suppssfv.a $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. D |-> A ) supp Y ) C_ L ) $.
suppssfv.f $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` Y ) = Z ) $.
suppssfv.v $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> A e. V ) $.
suppssfv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
suppssfv $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. D |-> ( F ` A ) ) supp Z ) C_ L ) $.
$d D x $.
$d Y x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
